about.text:
Renade stood for solidarity, justice, and warmth.

On 28.08.2025 at around 2:16 a.m., she passed away peacefully — surrounded by dear people.

This page gathers memories, provides information about remembrance, and invites your solidarity.

Update: The fundraising goal has been reached. Further donations are still welcome and will go to projects that Renade was active in and that were close to her heart. The collected funds enable her burial in the forest cemetery (Friedwald) at Burg Plesse — at Renade’s chosen resting place next to her friend Lena.

quotes.text:
Göttingen,
Um 2:16 Uhr ist dein Herz stehen geblieben.
Die Stimme deiner Straße ist stumm.
Deine Seele ist frei.
Die Liebe die du dieser Welt gestiftet hast bleibt
Und wir machen weiter für dich.
In Liebe zu dir
#renade

Renade

Nen Mensch wie dich den trifft man leider
Nicht so oft im Leben
Wo Alte-Weiße-Männer-Neide
Gern den Ton vorgeben
Denn denen passt ein Mensch wie du
Oft nicht in ihre Suppe
Denn wer dich kennt dem sind im Nu
Die Obermacker Schnuppe
Bei jeder Demo Stets dabei
Bei jeder Soliküche
Bringt Chunks und Stampf und Reis und Brei
Auf vollgeklebte Tische
Und wär auf dieser weiten Welt
Nur ein Prozent dir ähnlich
Bräuchts weder Politik noch Geld
Das Paradies wärs nämlich

quotes.author: ThOP Ensemble
quotes.text:
Dear current and former ThOP people, dear friends of Renate,

Quiet — she certainly wasn’t, our Renate! You could hear her coming from afar, her voice always resonated throughout the ThOP. Now it has fallen silent, but its echo will accompany us for a long time.

On the night of 28.08.2025, our long-time collaborator Renate Hillebrandt (Renade) passed away after a short and serious illness.

Her absence tears a hole in our midst. We are incredibly sad.

If you were able to get to know Renate over the roughly 20 years in which she contributed to the Theater im ThOP with commitment, a full heart, and complete dedication, we would be glad if you joined us in remembrance.

The ensemble of the current production ‘Lady Windermere’s Fan’, in which Renate continued to work until the end as assistant director and actor, has set up a memorial table at ThOP. You can leave a few kind words there.

[...]

We would also like to invite you to a gathering at ThOP to think of Renate together and talk about her. People from other social contexts that Renate (Renade) was part of will also take part. The date is 14.09 (a Sunday) from 16:00 to about 21:00. The official part starts at 16:30. If you would like to contribute a speech or something musical, please contact Christa (christa.thop@web.de) by 10.09.

A piano will be on stage on 14.09 and can be used; we are also happy about any photos you bring.

Your ThOP people,
In quiet and loud remembrance

donate.transparency: Update: The fundraising goal has been reached (€5,945). Further donations are welcome and will go to projects that Renade was active in and that were close to her heart. — We collected more than €5,000 to enable a dignified farewell. Every donated extra euro is used carefully: first for the burial in the forest cemetery at Burg Plesse at Renade’s chosen resting place next to her friend Lena; funds beyond that go to the mentioned projects.
donate.cashDescription: Please talk to us if you would like to put some money in the donation box. You can do this at ThOP, the Wednesday kitchen of Forum Waageplatz (03.09 from 17h at OM10), at the Weltladen, and at other events.

events.title: Interment in the FriedWald
events.details: Interment at the FriedWald forest cemetery at Plesse Castle with a shuttle service from the ThOP. We are organizing a shuttle from the ThOP to the FriedWald. We ask everyone arriving by car who has a free seat to take others from the ThOP along. If you would like a ride or can offer one, please come to the ThOP at 2 pm and, if possible, let us know beforehand at haaa@posteo.de. By the way: Forestry roads may be driven on up to the gravesite for people with mobility impairments.
